heading1: Enjoy playing games without a gaming rig
subheading1: Stream your favorite games, anytime & on any device with your progress being saved in the cloud!
subheading2: Run most new age games on the oldest devices without paying a single penny on hardware updates.
subheading3: You won't have to download any gaming files to play a game with OnePlay.
subheading4: OnePlay makes gaming extremely portable and gives you the independence to game anywhere & anytime.
subheading5: Cloud gaming services let you game through Android, iPhones, Windows, Mac and more.
headingteam: The OnePlay team is a multicultural melting pot of competent & knowledgeable industry experts.
sub-ourMentor: Tarun Katiyal & Jitendra Gupta have equipped the team to take OnePlay to the next level in the world of gaming & network.
